23: O que há de errado, Mei-senpai?

ほら、反応があったでしょ？
See? What did I tell you?

You see, what did I say?
See, you got a reaction, didn't you?

不思議な機械。これを作った方って、とてもすごい方なのでしょうね。

Esta máquina é cheia de surpresas, a pessoa que a fez deve ter sido uma pessoa muito inteligente e habilidosa.
What a wonderful machine it is, the person who invented this must be a very powerful person ......
A strange machine. The person who made this must be a very amazing person.
I don't know whether he is eruditely or not, but he likes running everywhere.
厉不厉害我不知道，不过他肯定是一个喜欢到处乱跑的就是了。
んー、すごい……のかな？行方不明にしょっちゅうなるヤツだよ。
음~ 대단한... 건가? 실종되기 일쑤인 녀석이야.

Eu não sei se ele é tudo isso, mas ele definitivamente é o tipo de pessoa que anda por aí.
I don't know if it's great, but he's definitely one that likes to run around that is.
Hmmm...is it the amazing ......? I'm the guy who goes missing all the time.
Oh? Do you know him well?
哦？琪亚娜你跟他很熟吗？
キアナちゃん、その人と知り合いなの？
Oh? Kiana-chan, do you know him well?
Oh? Kiana, você é próxima dele?
Oh? Kiana do you know him well?
Kiana, do you know that person?
Not really, but he is my… I don't want to talk about him… We'd better find the fox and clear the Houkai source on her.
也不是特别熟，虽然他是我的…算了，不想提起那个家伙…我们还是先找到那只狐狸把她身上的崩坏源清理掉再说吧。
知り合いというか、私の……ごめん、この話、今はやめましょう。それよりも白狐の捜索に専念しなくちゃ。
아는 사이라기보다, 내... 미안, 이 이야기는 지금은 그만하자. 그보다 백호 수색에 집중해야 해.
I mean, he's more of an acquaintance, but... Sorry, I'd rather not talk about that for now. We need to focus on searching for that White Fox instead.

Not particularly familiar either, although he is my...forget it, don't want to bring up that guy...let's just find that fox and clean up the source of disintegration on her first.
I don't know you or my ...... sorry, let's not talk about this right now. I have to focus more on the search for the white fox.
嗯，琪亚娜你不想说就算了。
え……ええ、キアナちゃんが話したくないなら、無理に聞かないわ。
어... 응, 키아나이 말하기 싫다면, 억지로 듣지 않을게.
Oh... okay, if you don't want to talk, I won't make you, Kiana-chan.
Ok Kiana. Se você não quer falar sobre isso, então não importa.
Well, Kiana you don't want to talk about it, forget it.
Yeah, ...... Yeah, if Kiana doesn't want to talk about it, I won't force her to listen.
行きましょう、キアナちゃん。

Não sei ...... são vocês... são vocês... são vocês... são vocês ...... não tentem me manipular!
I don't know ...... it's you guys...it's you guys it's you ...... don't try to manipulate me!
I don't know! Yes, it's ...... surely your fault! It's your fault ...... and don't think you can deceive me, my mistress!

Watch out! Mei! She acts weird!
学姐小心！它的气息变得奇怪了！
先輩、気を付けて！様子が変だよッ！
선배, 조심해! 상태가 이상해!
Senpai, careful! Something's wrong!
Mei-senpai, cuidado! Está saindo dela uma aura muito estranha!
Watch out! Its scent has become strange!
Senpai, be careful! There's something wrong with you!

Why?! If I can understand her words earlier…
为什么会这样呢，如果我能够早一点明白她说的话，那就不会是今天这样了吧……
何故、こうなったのじゃ。もっと早くあの子の話の意味が分かっておれば、かようなことにならずに済んだはずじゃったのに……。
어째서 이렇게 됐을까. 좀 더 일찍 그 아이의 말의 의미를 알았더라면, 이런 일이 되지 않았을 텐데…….
Why did it have to come to this? If only I had understood what she was saying sooner, things wouldn't have had to turn out like this...
Por quê isso aconteceu? Se eu tivesse entendido o significado da história daquela garota antes, eu teria evitado tal situação...
Why is it so, if I could understand what she said earlier, it would not be like this today ......
How did this happen? If I had understood the meaning of her story earlier, I could have avoided such a situation. ......

Do you always remember what she said to you?
你一直记得她对你说的话吗？
白狐さん、あの女の子とどんな話をしたのか、今でもずっと覚えているの？
백호 씨, 그 여자 아이와 어떤 이야기를 나눴는지 지금도 계속 기억하고 있어?
Miss White Fox, do you still remember your conversations with that girl?
Você acabou de se lembrar do que ela disse para você?
Do you always remember what she said to you?
Mr. White Fox, do you still remember what kind of conversation you had with that girl all this time?

No, I just recall that part.
不是的，只是刚刚才想起来。
ああ。じゃが、その意味を理解したのは、この姿になってからじゃ。
그렇다. 하지만 그 의미를 이해한 건 이 모습이 된 후야.
Yes. However, I only understood what the words meant after I assumed this form.
Não, só me ocorreu agora.
No, it just occurred to me.
Yes, but it was not until I took on this form that I understood its meaning. But it wasn't until I took on this form that I understood what it meant.
msg
Before the Houkai explosion, I was just a normal arctic fox, lived in this shrine for a long time.
在这里发生变故之前，我只是一只普通的白狐，在这片神社，安静地居住了很长一段时间。
何せ妾は神社で静かに暮らしていただけの、ただの白い狐じゃからな。
어쨌든 나는 신사에서 조용히 살고 있던 그냥 흰 여우였으니까.
After all, I was just a white fox who lived quietly at this shrine.
Antes do surto de Honkai, eu era apenas uma raposa branca comum que viveu neste santuário, silenciosamente, por um longo tempo.
Before the change happened here, I was just an ordinary white fox that lived in this shrine, quietly, for a long time.
After all, she was just a white fox who lived quietly in a shrine.
msg
I couldn't understand human language that time, but I can remember what she said to me. Now, I finally can understand her.
那个时候的我，并不能理解人类的语言，可是她对我说的话，她口中发出的声音，我并没有忘记，直到现在，我才渐渐理解了那些话的意义。
狐だった頃の妾に人の言葉など理解できんかった。それでも、あの娘の声は今でも鮮明に覚えておる。あの時、何を伝えたかったのか、今になってわかるとは……。
여우였을 때의 나에게 사람의 말 따위 이해할 수 없었지. 그럼에도, 그 소녀의 목소리는 지금도 선명히 기억하고 있다. 그때, 무엇을 전하고 싶었는지, 이제야 알게 되다니…….
When I was a fox, I was unable to understand human language. But I still remember that girl's voice clearly. I never thought I would understand what she was trying to tell me then...

Naquela época, eu não conseguia entender a linguagem humana, mas as palavras que ela me dizia, o som que saía de sua boca. não o esqueci. Então, até agora, eu estava gradualmente descobrindo o significado dessas palavras.

At that time, I was not able to understand human language, but the words she said to me, the sound that came out of her mouth, I did not forget, until now, I gradually understood the meaning of those words.
When I was a fox, I could not understand human language. But I still vividly remember her voice. I never thought I would understand what she was trying to tell me at the time. ......
msg
Her parents lived overseas so she lived in academy. She doesn't have much friends in the academy.
她的双亲在海外工作，她就常年寄宿在学校之中。性格内向的她，在学校并没有太多朋友。
あの娘の両親は異国の地で働いておったそうじゃ。そのせいもあって、寮での生活も長いと言っておった。内気な性格ゆえ、友達も少なかったようじゃ。
그 아이의 부모는 이국땅에서 일하셨다더군. 그 탓에 기숙사 생활도 길었다더라. 내성적인 성격 탓에 친구도 적었던 모양이지.
The girl's parents were working abroad. Because of that, she lived in the school dormitory for a long time. Because of her shy personality, she didn't have many friends.
Seus pais estavam trabalhando no exterior e ela passou muito tempo na Academia. Sendo introvertida, ela não tinha muitos amigos na escola.
Her parents were working overseas and she spent a lot of time boarding at school. Being an introvert, she didn't have many friends at school.
The girl's parents worked in a foreign country. Because of this, she spent a lot of time in the dormitory. She was shy and did not have many friends.
msg
When she felt sad, she went to this shrine. She always brought some food to feed animals here.
难过的时候，她就会来这个神社求签许愿，还会带很多食物喂养附近的小动物。
この地に頼る者がおらんかったあの子は、悲しいことがあるごとにこの神社へと来ておった。手にはいつも、妾やこの近くに住む動物たちへの手土産を持っての。
이곳에 의지할 데 없던 그 아이는 슬픈 일이 있을 때마다 이 신사로 찾아왔더군. 손에는 언제나 나나 근처에 사는 동물들을 위한 선물을 쥐고서 말이야.
The girl, who had no one to rely on in this area, would come to this shrine whenever something sad happened, always carrying gifts for me and the other animals that lived nearby.
Quando ela estava triste, ela vinha a este santuário para fazer um desejo e trazer muita comida para alimentar os pequenos animais próximos aqui.
When she was sad, she would come to this shrine to ask for a wish and bring a lot of food to feed the small animals in the neighborhood.
She had no one to turn to in this area, so she would come to this shrine whenever she felt sad. She always had a souvenir in her hand for her mistress and the animals that lived nearby.
msg
I always sit with her under the eave, she talked to me when she touched me.
我常常陪她坐在屋檐下，看她一边梳理着我的毛发，一边向我倾诉她的心事。比如，成绩不好的时候很难过，比如暗恋很久的男生居然跟其他女生恋爱了。
妾たちは社の屋根の下によく座っておった。あの子は妾の毛並みを整えながら、ぽつぽつと自分の事を語ってくれたのじゃ。成績の良し悪しや色恋沙汰などの。どんな話をするにしても、声には悲しみが含まれておった。
우리는 신사 지붕 아래에 앉아있는 일이 많았지. 그 아이는 내 털을 다듬어주면서, 조금씩 자신에 대해 이야기해주더군. 성적 좋고 나쁜 거나 연애 이야기 같은 것들 말이야. 무슨 이야기를 하든 목소리엔 슬픔이 서려있었지.

We often sat under the roof of the shrine. While she pet my fur, she would tell me little bits about herself. Her grades, her crushes, and so on. Whenever she talked, there was a sadness in her voice.

Muitas vezes eu me sentava com ela sob o beiral e a observava escovar meu cabelo enquanto desabafava seu coração para mim. Por exemplo, ela ficava triste quando tirava uma nota ruim, ou quando um garoto por quem ela estava apaixonada há muito tempo realmente se apaixonava por outra garota.

I often sit with her under the eaves and watch her brush my hair while pouring her heart out to me. For example, it's sad when you get a bad grade, like when the boy you've had a crush on for a long time actually falls in love with another girl.

The concubines used to sit under the roof of the company. The girl would ruffle my hair and talk to me about her life. Good or bad grades, love affairs, and so on. No matter what she talked about, there was always a hint of sadness in her voice.
msg
Her grade was poor, she dreamed become an author. Her parents gave her a lot of stress, push her do things she doesn't like.
她的成绩并不太好，一心想成为小说家的她，迫于父母的压力，一直在勉强自己做着自己不喜欢的事情。
あの娘、学業はからっきしだったようじゃ。物書きになりたいという夢だけは強く胸に抱いておったが、勉学を疎かにすることを両親は望んでおらんかったのだろう。心を押し殺しながら、生き続けているのが見て取れた。
그 아이, 공부는 완전히 망쳤더군. 작가가 되고 싶다는 꿈만은 간직하고 있었지만, 공부를 소홀히 하는 걸 부모님이 바라시진 않았을 거야. 마음을 억누르며 살아가는 게 보였어.

That girl, it seems, was a complete failure in her studies. She had a strong dream of becoming a writer, but her parents probably didn't want her to neglect her studies. I could see that she continued to live her life suppressing her feelings.
Suas notas não eram muito boas e ela estava determinada a se tornar uma atriz. Mas ela estava sob muita pressão de seus pais e continuava se forçando a fazer coisas que não gostava de fazer.

Her grades were not very good, and she was determined to become a novelist, but she was pressured by her parents to do something she didn't like, and kept pushing herself to do something she didn't like.

It seems that she did not do very well academically. She had a strong dream of becoming a writer, but her parents probably did not want her to neglect her studies. I could see that she continued to live her life while suppressing her heart.
msg
She felt so sad, she disliked it. She wanted a different life.
这让她十分难过，她并不想要这样的生活，想要颠覆这样的人生。
孤独、そして強要され続ける生活に嫌気が差し、あの娘の心には深い悲しみが刻まれたのじゃろう。生き地獄のような生活が一変することを強く願っておった。
고독, 그리고 강요당하는 삶에 싫증이 나, 그 아이 마음속에 깊은 슬픔이 새겨졌을 거야. 살인골 같은 삶이 완전히 바뀌길 간절히 바랐지.
Tired of the loneliness and the life she was forced to live, a deep sadness must have been engraved in her heart. She fervently hoped for a change from her hellish life.
Isso a deixou triste, ela não queria uma vida assim. Ela queria dar a volta por cima.
This made her very sad, she did not want such a life and wanted to turn it upside down.
She must have been deeply saddened by the loneliness and the coercion of her life. She was hoping for a complete change in her life, which had become a living hell for her.
msg
Until some days later, I hadn't seen her. However, I waited here day bu day…
直到不久前的某天后，少女就再也没有来过这里。我一整天一整天地在这里守候，可是她再也没有出现过。
そして、ある日を境にあの娘は神社へと足を運ばなくなった。妾は、来る日も来る日も待ち続けた。
그러던 어느 날을 기점으로 그 아이는 신사에 오지 않게 되었어. 나는 오는 날도 오는 날도 기다렸지.
And then, one day, the girl stopped coming to the shrine. Day after day, I continued to wait.
Até que um certo dia, não muito tempo atrás, a jovem parou de vir. Esperei aqui o dia todo, todos os dias, mas ela não aparecia de novo.
Until a certain day not long ago, the young girl never came back here. I waited here all day and all day, but she never showed up again.
Then one day, that girl stopped visiting the shrine. The mistress continued to wait day after day.
msg
She cried at the last day, I could't understand her that time. Is she leaving to find her parents or?
她在最后一次离开前，曾哭着对我说过什么，然而那时的我根本不明白。她是毕业了吗？离开这个国家回到父母身边了吗？还是去实践了那说走就走的远行？
あの娘が最後に神社へと訪れた時、泣き腫らした顔で言葉を漏らしていたことを覚えておる。その言葉の意味を、当時の妾は理解できなかったのじゃ。きっとどこか遠くへと移り住んだのだろうと、勝手に思っておった。
그 아이가 마지막으로 신사를 찾았을 때, 울어 부은 얼굴로 내뱉은 말을 기억하고 있네. 그 말의 의미를 당시의 나는 이해할 수 없었지. 분명 어딘가 먼 곳으로 이사 간 거라 생각했어.

I remember that the last time she visited the shrine, her face was swollen with tears as she uttered a few words. I did not understand the meaning of those words at the time. I just assumed that she must have moved to a place far away.

Ela me disse algo quando chorava antes de partir pela última vez, mas na hora eu simplesmente não entendi. Ela se formou? Ela deixou o país e voltou para seus pais? Ou ela fez aquela longa viagem que ela disse que faria?

She had said something to me in tears before she left for the last time, yet at the time I simply didn't understand. Did she graduate? Did she leave the country and go back to her parents? Or did she go on that long trip that she said she would go on?

I remember that the last time she visited the shrine, she was sobbing and her face was swollen with tears and she let out a few words. At the time, I did not understand the meaning of those words. I thought she must have moved somewhere far away.
msg
After the Houkai explosion, I got a human body and I finally knew her meaning.
直到崩坏来临后，直到我变成了这个样子，我才一下子明白了她的意思，理解了她最后对我说的话。
崩壊により妾の身体が人の形をするようになり、あの言葉をやっと理解した。
붕괴로 인해 내 몸이 사람의 형태를 하게 되자, 비로소 그 말을 이해했네.
As the Honkai caused my body to take on a human form, I finally understood those words.
It wasn't until after the collapse came, until I became like this, that I understood what she meant all of a sudden and understood her last words to me.
I finally understood those words when the collapse caused the concubine's body to take human form.
msg
She said…
她说…
あの娘は——
그 아이는 ——
She said...
Ela disse que...
She said...
That girl...
msg
If the world breaks tomorrow morning when she wakes up, evereyone can be themselves, what a wonderful world…
如果明天醒来，这个世界突然崩坏了，那该多好啊，不再有这些规则与羁绊，让每个人都可以回归真正的自己……
——明日の朝、目を覚ましたら、世界が滅んでたらいいのに。ルールもしがらみも何もかもなくなって、みんながみんな、本当の自分をさらけ出せたらいいのに——こう言っておったんじゃ。
——내일 아침, 눈을 뜨면 세상이 멸망했으면 좋겠어. 규칙도 구속도 다 없어져서 모두가 진짜 자신을 드러낼 수 있으면 좋겠어—— 이렇게 말했던 거야.
"...I wish that when I wake up tomorrow morning, the world will end. I wish that all rules and restrictions will disappear, and that everyone can be their true selves."
Se acordarmos amanhã e o mundo se desmoronar subitamente, como seria bom deixar de ter estas regras e restrições para que cada um possa ser como o seu verdadeiro eu.
If we wake up tomorrow and the world suddenly collapses, how nice it would be to no longer have these rules and constraints so that everyone can return to their true selves ......
--I wish I could wake up tomorrow morning and the world would be destroyed. I wish all the rules and ties were gone, and everyone could reveal their true selves.

What happened to her?
她…怎么了？
彼女は……どうなっちゃったの？
그녀는... 어떻게 된 거야?
What... happened to her?
Ela... O que aconteceu com ela?
She...what's wrong?
What happened to her ......?

Now, I think I know her, I don't need to keep this body, you can let me turn back to a fox.
现在，我已经完全明白了她的心意，也不必再保持这样的人形了，你可以让我变回自己了。
明白じゃろう。結果、あのような姿へと変わり果てたのじゃ。あの娘の気持ちが、今やっと分かった。もう十分じゃ。妾を元の姿に戻してくれるか？
분명하지. 결국 그런 모습으로 변해버린 거야. 그 아이의 마음을 이제야 알겠구나. 이제 충분해. 날 원래 모습으로 돌려줄 수 있겠나?
It's obvious. As a result, I ended up like this. Now I finally understand how that girl felt. Enough is enough. Can you change me back to my original form?
Agora que entendi completamente o que ela quis dizer e não preciso mais permanecer nesta forma humana, você pode me deixar voltar a ser eu mesma.
Now that I have fully understood her mind and no longer have to remain in this human form, you can let me change back to myself.
It is obvious. The result was that she ended up looking like that. I now know how she felt. Enough is enough. Will you return me to my original form?

真的可以吗？
本当に、いいの？
정말, 괜찮은 거야?
Are you... really sure?

Is it really possible?
Really, are you sure?

Hey! I don't believe that.
嘿！你真的以为我会上当吗？
……っ！？あんた、白狐じゃないわね？
...!? 너, 백호가 아니네?
...?! You're not really White Fox, are you? (TN: I have no clue wtf just happened. I wish there was narration in these...)

You! You again!
你！又是你这个小姑娘！
ちっ！小娘が、そのまま騙されておれば良いものを！
쳇! 꼬맹이가 그대로 속아넘어가면 좋았을 걸!
Tch! It would've been nice if you were more gullible, little girl!
Você! É você de novo, garotinha!

Damn! I wish the little girl had been fooled as she was!

Tell you something, this fox is mine, don't try to stop me! Otherwise I will beat you all!
我告诉你，这只小狐狸已经是我的了，别想再来阻止我！到时候看我把你们全都收拾掉！
この狐の精神はもう掌握した！誰も止めることなどできぬ！次に会う時は、お主ら全員まとめて屠ってやろう。
이 여우의 정신은 이미 장악했다! 누구도 막을 수 없어! 다음에 만날 때는 너희들 모두 한꺼번에 처치해주마.
I have mastered this fox's mind! No one can stop me! Next time I see you, I will slaughter you all at once.
Você deve saber que esta raposinha já é minha, não tente me impedir de novo! No final, eu vou matar todos vocês!
I tell you, this little fox is already mine, don't try to stop me again! I'll get rid of all of you then!
The spirit of this fox has been seized! No one can stop him! Next time we meet, I will slaughter you all together.
